sentences.en: Do you like summer? Yes, but I like winter better.
sentences.cn: 你喜欢夏天吗？是的，但是我更喜欢冬天。

sentences.en: During winter, many people swim and the pool is crowded.
sentences.cn: 冬季来游泳的人很多，泳池人满为患。

sentences.en: I like winter because we play soccer!
sentences.cn: 我喜欢冬天因为我们踢足球！

sentences.en: If unused, winter radishes run to seed in spring.
sentences.cn: 如果不去动的话，冬萝卜会在春天开花结籽。

sentences.en: In the winter she wears thick socks, Wellington boots and gloves.
sentences.cn: 冬天，她穿着厚袜子和橡胶雨靴，戴着手套。

sentences.en: It is hard to see how people will get through the winter.
sentences.cn: 难以想象人们将怎样熬过这个冬天。

sentences.en: Right now we are in the changeover period between autumn and winter.
sentences.cn: 眼下，我们正处于秋冬交替的时候。

sentences.en: She was kitted out with winter coat, skirts, jumpers.
sentences.cn: 她全副武装，穿着冬天的外套、裙子、套头衫。

sentences.en: She won the individual gold medal at the Winter Olympics.
sentences.cn: 她在冬奥会上获得了个人金牌。

sentences.en: So many days are routine and uninteresting, especially in winter.
sentences.cn: 许多日子都过得平淡乏味，尤其是在冬天。

sentences.en: Some types of garden furniture must be stored inside in the winter.
sentences.cn: 有几类花园家具冬季必须存放在室内。

sentences.en: Thatch is naturally warm in winter and cool in summer.
The phantom used to appear unexpectedly, but mostly during the winter.
sentences.cn: 那个幽灵过去常常出人意料地出现，但是大多在冬季。

sentences.en: The sudden onset of winter caused havoc with rail and air transport.
sentences.cn: 冬天的突然降临让铁路和航空运输系统陷入混乱。

sentences.en: The winter sports bring the jet set from England.
sentences.cn: 冬季运动吸引了英格兰的富豪们。

sentences.en: They had to conserve the candles now with winter upon them.
sentences.cn: 冬天眼看就要到了，他们不得不把蜡烛省着用。

sentences.en: Well, the worst of the winter should be over.
sentences.cn: 不过，冬天最糟糕的一段日子总该过去了。

sentences.en: Winter weather can leave you feeling fatigued and tired.
sentences.cn: 冬季会让人感觉疲乏无力。

words.tran_cn: 作过冬准备；在…装御寒设备
为…作过冬准备；使适应冬季使用；使防冻

phrases.tran_cn: 夏和冬；经过整整一年；冬暖夏凉
冬奥会；冬季奥林匹克运动会

trans.tran_en: the season after autumn and before spring, when the weather is coldest
the season after autumn and before spring, when the weather is coldest
